Sentencas: Being stable to carbonization, praseodymium nickelates-cobaltites and their nanocomposites are promising materials for intermediate -temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT SOFC) cathodes and oxygen separation membranes.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: This work aims to elucidate specificity of their structure and transport properties on the basis of synchrotron radiation studies.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: PrNi0.5Co0-delta(PNC), Ce-0.9 Y-0.1 O2-delta (YDC), Ce0.65Pr 0.25Y0.1O2-delta(YPDC), CeO2 and PrO2-delta powders were synthesized with the Pechini technique.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: PNC YDC nanocomposite was obtained via ultrasonic dispersion.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: The materials were characterized in in situ synchrotron XRD analyses with unit cell volume relaxation (CVR) and extended Xray absorption fine structure (EXAFS).
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: Bulk and surface oxygen mobility and reactivity were studied with 02 temperature -programmed desorption and CVR methods.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: Strong cation redistribution between domains was revealed.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: Fast oxygen diffusion and exchange in the PNC YDC nanocomposite were shown to be determined by developed interface and variation in the Pr3+/4+ cations' charge in the Y-Pr-Ce-O domains.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: Selected compositions were deposited as functional layers in asymmetric membranes for oxygen separation.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite

Sentencas: According to the test results, the membranes demonstrated promising performance.
Titulo: Structural Studies of Pr Nickelate-Cobaltite Y-Doped Ceria Nanocomposite
